sentences.en: Between 1940 and 1943 he had a string of 62 consecutive victories.
sentences.cn: 他在1940年至1943年间连续62次获胜。

sentences.en: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.cn: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

sentences.en: He was reelected for four consecutive terms.
High - street sales have fallen for the fifth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 主商业街区销量已经连续5个月下降了.

sentences.en: In System / 32, consecutive numbering of statements at the end of run, if requested.
sentences.cn: 在IBMSystem/32中, 在运行结束时按请求对语句作连续编号.

sentences.en: It had rained for four consecutive days.
It has rained for four consecutive days.
She was absent for nine consecutive days.
She was within sight of Navratilova'srecord of seventy-four consecutive wins.
sentences.cn: 她已经逼近了纳夫拉蒂洛娃74连胜的纪录。

sentences.en: The Chairman and Vice - Chairmen of the Standing Committee shall serve no more than two consecutive terms.
sentences.cn: 委员长、副委员长连续任职不得超过两届.

sentences.en: The consecutive swings were becoming smaller and smaller as the candelabrum was slowly coming to rest.
sentences.cn: 随着烛架慢慢地将要停下来,连续的摆动越来越小了.

sentences.en: The Cup was won for the third consecutive year by the Toronto Maple Leafs.
sentences.cn: 多伦多枫叶队连续第三年捧杯。

sentences.en: The manufacturing economy contracted in October for the sixth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 10月，制造业经济已经连续第6个月出现萎缩状况。

sentences.en: The streets of New York City are numbered in consecutive order.
sentences.cn: 纽约市街是按序编号的.
这些是他连绵不断的幻想.

phrases.tran_cn: 连续营业日；连续作业日

trans.tran_en: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions
